summary: A cinematic performance friendly enb made for COT with support for RLO and ELFX.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5]-A small slightly awkward description-[/size][/b]

I wanted to make a preset that made me feel like i was in silent hill but for people who don't know what that is or just don't see the resemblance than this is an other cinematic preset :)

From Gamespot
[youtube]iolek1Q9ocY[/youtube]

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2jcc7lf.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=5]-Known Issues-[/size][/b]

Please keep in mind that because COT has a lot of different skies there might be a moment that something might not be exactly right, but that would be rare and nothing extreme or game breaking will occur just letting you know :)

[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/5cn7yt.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=5]-Requests-[/size][/b]

• Please try to report any misspellings or grammar mistakes you see here as English is not my primary language.

• Taking screenshots is not really my strong point so i would really appreciate any contribution .

• If you find any bugs or something you think needs changing please let me know.

[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5apauf.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=5]-Installation-[/size][/b]

1) Extract Silent Hill - ENB somewhere, the desktop would be a good place.
2) Download [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0228.htm]ENBSeries v0.228[/url]
3) Open the .rar file then go to the "WrapperVersion" folder and take the "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" files and drop them inside the "Silent Hill - ENB\Presets" folder.
4) Decide which version of the preset you want to use and drop inside the "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe".
5) Copy all the contents from the version you will use and paste them inside your skyrim game folder, not the data folder! 
6) Copy the data folder inside the Silent Hill - ENB and paste it inside the skyrim game directory and overwrite everything.
7) .......
8) Profit!

[b][size=5]-My Other Preset-[/size][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41504//?][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9jhsf7.png[/IMG][/url]

[b][size=5]-Required Mods-[/size][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
                      or
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX (without the enhanced module)[/url]

[b][size=5]-Highly Recommended-[/size][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42089//?]Climates of Tamriel - Weather Patch - Snow[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799/?]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch - Fog Rain Overcast[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36146/?]Ewis High ini and prefs files[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16541/?]Real Rain[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15506/?]Lightning during Thunder Storms[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33846/?]Ewis Distant Terrain[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls and SkyMills[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7901/?]No Menu and Loading Smoke[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29791/?]No More Ugly Bronze Shine[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85//?]Enhanced Night Skyrim (High-density starfield)[/url]

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/24pgzt2.jpg[/IMG]

[b][size=5]-Credits-[/size][/b]

Boris Vorontsov: For creating the ENB series.
IndigoNeko aka MTichenor: For SkyRealism - ENB Evolved and letting me use his files as a base to make mien.
--JawZ--: For his enbsunsprite.fx and enbsunsprite.tga files.
mindflux: For his particle patch and the Snow FX mod.
University of Zaragoza team (Jorge Jimenez, Belen Masia, Jose Echevarria, Fernando Navarro, Diego Gutierrez): For creating SMAA.
Andrej Dudenhefner: For the injectSMAA.
RegcideZ: For his chill beat inside the file.
artem1s and mindflux: For Dark Dungeons for ENB mod.
author: LucidAPs
